response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its worth to us and its significance to you, we propose a price of $14,000 for this exclusive item. We are confident that this offer strikes a fair balance between maximizing our return on investment and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable price. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
